snippet: An effort to recall James W. Knowles III is intensifying after activists were disappointed in the results of last week’s City Council election.
abstract: James W Knowles III, mayor of Ferguson, Mo, is challenging supporters of recall effort to oust him from his position by saying that he was never made aware that residents were unhappy with status quo; has been targeted by critics who say he allowed discriminatory and corrupt government to thrive during his tenure, which was brought to light by shooting death of Michael Brown by Ferguson police officer Darren Wilson.
lead_paragraph: An effort to recall James W. Knowles III is intensifying after activists were disappointed in the results of last week’s City Council election.

headline.main: Though Petition Seeks His Ouster, Ferguson Mayor Says He Is Best Leader for City
headline.print_headline: Though Petition Seeks His Ouster, Ferguson Mayor Says He Is Best Leader for City
